name: Seal Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Try yourself being a seal with this animal survival simulator! Swim, hunt and explore wilderness with Seal Survival Simulator 3D game!

Swim the deep sea exploring underwater world and live the life of a wild seal! Go fishing or hunt other sea animals to survive and explore wilderness! In this survival simulator, your wild seal has health, energy, oxygen and hunger rate, mind this rates and never let your sea animal die! Go fishing, swim and hunt with Seal Survival Simulator 3D – great animal game for all ages!

Meet other wild animal to join your flock, go fishing, battle against predators and hunt smaller animals to survive with this seal simulator in 3D! Maintain health, hunger and energy rates to set up a flock of seals! Explore wilderness and amazing underwater world with Seal Survival Simulator 3D! Hund down your prey being a wild seal!

Seal Survival Simulator 3D features:

Great animal survival simulator
Level up your wild seal - swim the sea, explore underwater, hunt, fish and survive!
Battle against other wild animalsExplore endless wilderness
3D graphics

Try this animal survival simulator to explore wilderness being a powerful predator, the seal! Show your hunting and fishing skills, chase other wild animals to battle against and enjoy seal life! Try Seal Survival Simulator 3D – great survival simulator for all tastes!
